14.control-description: This parameter is used to diable or enable log streaming.

113.control-description: This parameter allows user to set FPGA temperature alarm threshold.

116.control-description: This parameter allows user to set fan speed. This parameter is subject to product options.

120.control-description: This parameter allows user to select different time source.

121.control-description: This parameter allows user to get and set the value of the real time clock. The format for setting the clock is mm/dd/yy hh:mm, the clock will not  set properly if this format is not followed.

122.control-description: This parameter allows user to select different time zone.

123.control-description: This parameter allows user to select Day Light Saving ON or OFF.

125.control-description: This parameter allows user to restart time management to apply changes.

3003.control-description: This parameter allows user to set the name tag for the top level crosspoint input.

3007.control-description: This parameter allows user to set the routing mode for the top level crosspoint output. (Change the mode will disconnect current route on this output).
